title: Tsuihou Sareta Renkinjutsushi, Adaruto Guzzu De Sekai Wo Sukuu ~ Donna Monsutaa Mo Zettai Ni Ikaseru Otoko ~
alternative_title: 追放された錬金術師、アダルトグッズで世界を救う ～どんなモンスターも絶対にイカせる男～ ; The Exiled Alchemist Saves the World with Adult Toys – A Man Who Can Make Any Monster Orgasm Without Fail
status: 追放された錬金術師、アダルトグッズで世界を救う ～どんなモンスターも絶対にイカせる男～ ; The Exiled Alchemist Saves the World with Adult Toys – A Man Who Can Make Any Monster Orgasm Without Fail
description:
Description :
        **You’ve been making... nothing but adult toys?!**
Oruga Zumu, a man whose alchemy always turns everything into adult toys, is expelled from his party for **lowering the status.** However, the female knight Kuu Korosse, who appears before him, recognizes Oruga’s true power.
Thus begins the ¨**Sex War of The End,** where Oruga sets out to slay lustful monsters and save the world.
